@Reconstructor_2D/read_data.m

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 % =====================================================================
00002 %> @brief fuction reads measured data from a capacitance tomograph, and set
00003 %> this value to start solution
00004 %>
00005 %> @param file_name  a name of a file contained measuring data
00006 %> @param M          number of measurements
00007 %> @param frame1     number of frame contained capacitance measurements.
00008 %> @param frame2     number of frame contained capacitance measurements.
00009 %>
00010 %> @retval object.C_meas  capacitance maeaurements
00011 %> @retval object.C_min   minimal values of capacitances
00012 %> @retval object.C_max   maximal values of capacitances
00013 % =====================================================================
00014 function [object] = read_data(rec_obj,file_name,M,frame1,frame2)
00015 
00016 if nargin == 3
00017     frame1 = 3;
00018     frame2 = 3;
00019 end
00020 
00021 % ECT3 export text file
00022 % 1st column is frame time [ms]
00023 % 1st line are data for full filled sensor or maximum permittivity
00024 % 2nd line are data for empty sensor or minimum permittivity
00025 % 3rd and following lines are frames data
00026 % frame data are normalized Cn=(C-Cmin)/(Cmax-Cmin);
00027 C_max = dlmread(file_name,'',[0 1 0 M])';
00028 C_min = dlmread(file_name,'',[1 1 1 M])';
00029 %C_min = object.C_min;
00030 
00031 % read frame data and denormalize
00032 C_n  = dlmread(file_name,'',[frame1 1 frame2 M]);
00033 % TODO error when frame1 = frame2
00034 C    = mean(C_n,1)';
00035 C_un = C_min + C.*(C_max-C_min);
00036 
00037 rec_obj.real_data=1;
00038 % STATISTICS
00039 c_n = C_n';
00040 parfor i=1:size(c_n,2)
00041     c_un(:,i) = C_min + c_n(:,i).*(C_max-C_min);
00042 end
00043 c_un = c_un';
00044 c_mean = mean(c_un,1);
00045 c_std = std(c_un);
00046 
00047 % figure;
00048 % plot(c_std./c_mean*100);
00049 % figure;
00050 % plot(c_std/max(c_mean)*100);
00051 
00052 % M = size(C,1);
00053 % if M~=sensor.measurement_count
00054 %     disp 'Number of measurement differs from sensor model';
00055 %     return;
00056 % end
00057 
00058 
00059 
00060 object.C_max  = C_max;
00061 object.C_min  = C_min;
00062 object.C_meas = C_un;
00063 
00064 rec_obj.data_from_file=object;
00065 
00066 
00067       % #########################################################################
00068             % reprojection - projection for initial solution
00069               
00070              rec_obj.C_max = C_max; 
00071              rec_obj.C_min = C_min; 
00072             
00073             
00074             rec_obj.Cr_0  = rec_obj.S*rec_obj.Ep;
00075             %Cr_0  = (Cr_0-C_min)./(C_max-C_min);
00076 
00077             % normalized measurement
00078             rec_obj.Cm_n = (C_un-C_min)./(C_max-C_min);
00079             %Cm   = Cm_n;
00080             % projections denormalization using simulated max & min
00081             rec_obj.Cm   = rec_obj.C_min + rec_obj.Cm_n.*(rec_obj.C_max-rec_obj.C_min);
00082             rec_obj.Cr   = rec_obj.Cr_0;
